CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 30, 1957, pg. 40, reads: "Fashion Plates - Ethel Littlejohn and Lillian Allen stunned the crowd at the Tubman Guild benefit with their afternoon outfits. Mrs. Littlejohn wears a red broadcloth suit trimmed with matching dyed seal skin and a red Mr. John feathered half-hat.  Mrs. Allen's basic dress of French wool in navy and white, has a white Eisenhower jacket, and is trimmed with white knit. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Ethel Littlejohn wearing dark double breasted suit with boomerang shaped brooch, posed in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for Harriet Tubman Guild fashion show benefit
